Configuration.Name: Autoflagger Addon
Configuration.Author: Austin Smith, University of Maryland Libraries
Configuration.Description: Identifies requests which have not been updated recently, and flags them for staff attention

Setting.name: WatchQueues
Setting.Description: Comma-separated list of the queues to monitor.

Setting.name: RequestTypes
Setting.Description: Comma-separated list of request types to monitor (must be A, L, or B, for article, loan, or both)

Setting.name: DaysToWait
Setting.Description: Comma-separated list of the number of days to wait before flagging a request. Must correspond to the list of queues.

Setting.name: WatchFlags
Setting.Description: Comma-separated list of the flags to add. Must correspond to the list of queues. Must already be defined in the Customization Manager.
